main.name: Hakimi Shahrul
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio! This is the place where you get to know me better! This website is developed using React and Vue.js
main.bio: I'm hailed from Changlun, Kedah, Malaysia. I'm a productive individual that benefits computing skills for community and country and strives for excellence day by day. My objective is to strive for efficiency and sustainability for the future generations, so that they, too, would enjoy a peaceful and comforting life. I would also like to indulge myself in technology and computing skills especially hardware building software programming every day to benefit society.
